thread.title: Forsyth Park Fountain back to full operation as water flows
thread.title_full: Forsyth Park Fountain back to full operation as water flows

author: Richard Burkhart
title: Forsyth Park Fountain back to full operation as water flows
text: NEWS'A Christmas miracle' as Forsyth Fountain returns to full operation Richard BurkhartDec. 19, 2025, 11:36 a.m. ETA family poses for a photo with Santa in front of the fully operational fountain on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah Morning NewsThe fountain once again had water in the basin before having the water turned on on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah Morning NewsThe City of Savannah offered commemorative cookies featuring the fountain for the ceremonial turning on of the fountain on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah Morning NewsSavannah Mayor Van Johnson poses with Santa and Mrs. Claus in front of the fountain on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah Morning NewsAlderman Detric Leggett speaks before the ceremonial turning on of the fountain on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah Morning NewsCity Manager Jay Melder speaks before the ceremonial turning on of the fountain on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah Morning NewsSanta and Mrs. Claus were on hand before the ceremonial turning on of the fountain on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah Morning NewsSavannah Mayor Van Johnson is presented a wreath on behalf of Wreaths across America and Hunter Army Airfield on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah Morning NewsSavannah Mayor van Johnson reacts as water begins to flow from the fountain on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah Morning NewsWater begins to flow from the fountain on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah Morning NewsWater is once again flowing from the fountain on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah Morning NewsVisitors pose for photos as water is once again flowing from the fountain on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah Morning NewsFor the first time since summer water was once again flowing from the fountain on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah Morning NewsWater sprays from the fountain for the first time since summer on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah Morning NewsWater Water sprays from the fountain on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah Morning NewsVisitors pose for photos with Santa in front of the fountain after water was turned back on on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah Morning NewsThe fountain returned to full operation on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah Morning NewsWater sprays into the air from the fountain on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah Morning NewsThe fountain returned to full operation on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah Morning NewsAn artist works on a pastel drawing of the fountain after it was turned back on on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah Morning NewsVisitors snap photos in front of the fountain after it was returned to full operation on Friday, December 19, 2025 at Forsyth Park.Richard Burkhart/Savannah
